title: Awful Management

cons: - Typical startup challenges with fast growth, lack of processes and inexperienced decision making (however, willing to learn and constantly improve)
pros: - Great atmosphere with beautiful office in the heart of Munich and awesome colleagues to work towards a common goal or enjoy a beer or two with
text: Pros - Great atmosphere with beautiful office in the heart of Munich and awesome colleagues to work towards a common goal or enjoy a beer or two with - Many opportunities to take on responsibility from day one and develop within and beyond the role - Various company and team events, free gym and free German courses for internationals Cons - Typical startup challenges with fast growth, lack of processes and inexperienced decision making (however, willing to learn and constantly improve)
title: Ambitious and fun startup with typical "teething" problems
